00043 double TargetCalculator::size( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& W )
00044 {
00045   return Mesquite::cbrt( fabs(det(W)) );
00046 }
00047 
00048 double TargetCalculator::size( const MsqMatrix<3,2>& W )
00049 {
00050   return sqrt(length(W.column(0) * W.column(1)));
00051 }
00052 
00053 double TargetCalculator::size( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& W )
00054 {
00055   return sqrt( fabs(det(W)) );
00056 }
00057 
00058 MsqMatrix<3,3> TargetCalculator::skew( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& W )
00059 {
00060   MsqVector<3> a1    = W.column(0) * (1.0/length(W.column(0)));
00061   MsqVector<3> a2    = W.column(1) * (1.0/length(W.column(1)));
00062   MsqVector<3> a3    = W.column(2) * (1.0/length(W.column(2)));
00063   MsqVector<3> a1xa2 = a1 * a2;
00064   
00065   double lenx  = length(a1xa2);
00066   double alpha = fabs(a1xa2 % a3);
00067   double coeff = Mesquite::cbrt(1/alpha);
00068   double dot   = a1xa2 % (a1 * a3);
00069   
00070   MsqMatrix<3,3> q;
00071   q(0,0) = coeff; q(0,1) = coeff * (a1 % a2); q(0,2) = coeff * (a1 % a3);
00072   q(1,0) = 0.0;   q(1,1) = coeff * lenx;      q(1,2) = coeff * dot   / lenx;
00073   q(2,0) = 0.0;   q(2,1) = 0.0;               q(2,2) = coeff * alpha / lenx;
00074   return q;
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00078 MsqMatrix<2,2> TargetCalculator::skew( const MsqMatrix<3,2>& W )
00079 {
00080   MsqVector<3> alpha = W.column(0) * W.column(1);
00081   double a1_sqr      = W.column(0) % W.column(0);
00082   double a2_sqr      = W.column(1) % W.column(1);
00083   double dot         = W.column(0) % W.column(1);
00084   double a1a2        = sqrt(a1_sqr * a2_sqr);
00085   double coeff       = sqrt(a1a2/length(alpha));
00086 
00087   MsqMatrix<2,2> result;
00088   result(0,0) = coeff; result(0,1) = coeff * dot / a1a2;
00089   result(1,0) = 0.0  ; result(1,1) = 1/coeff;
00090   return result;
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 MsqMatrix<2,2> TargetCalculator::skew( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& W )
00095 {
00096   double alpha   = fabs(det(W));
00097   double a1_sqr  = W.column(0) % W.column(0);
00098   double a2_sqr  = W.column(1) % W.column(1);
00099   double dot     = W.column(0) % W.column(1);
00100   double a1a2    = sqrt(a1_sqr * a2_sqr);
00101   double coeff   = sqrt(a1a2/alpha);
00102 
00103   MsqMatrix<2,2> result;
00104   result(0,0) = coeff; result(0,1) = coeff * dot / a1a2;
00105   result(1,0) = 0.0  ; result(1,1) = 1/coeff;
00106   return result;
00107 }
00108 
00109 MsqMatrix<3,3> TargetCalculator::aspect( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& W )
00110 {
00111   double a1 = length(W.column(0));
00112   double a2 = length(W.column(1));
00113   double a3 = length(W.column(2));
00114   double coeff = 1.0/Mesquite::cbrt(a1*a2*a3);
00115   
00116   MsqMatrix<3,3> result(coeff);
00117   result(0,0) *= a1;
00118   result(1,1) *= a2;
00119   result(2,2) *= a3;
00120   return result;
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 MsqMatrix<2,2> TargetCalculator::aspect( const MsqMatrix<3,2>& W )
00125 {
00126   double a1_sqr  = W.column(0) % W.column(0);
00127   double a2_sqr  = W.column(1) % W.column(1);
00128   double sqrt_rho = sqrt(sqrt(a1_sqr/a2_sqr));
00129   
00130   MsqMatrix<2,2> result;
00131   result(0,0) = sqrt_rho; result(0,1) = 0.0;
00132   result(1,0) = 0.0     ; result(1,1) = 1/sqrt_rho;
00133   return result;
00134 }

00137 MsqMatrix<2,2> TargetCalculator::aspect( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& W )
00138 {
00139   double a1_sqr  = W.column(0) % W.column(0);
00140   double a2_sqr  = W.column(1) % W.column(1);
00141   double sqrt_rho = sqrt(sqrt(a1_sqr/a2_sqr));
00142   
00143   MsqMatrix<2,2> result;
00144   result(0,0) = sqrt_rho; result(0,1) = 0.0;
00145   result(1,0) = 0.0     ; result(1,1) = 1/sqrt_rho;
00146   return result;
00147 }
00148 
00149 MsqMatrix<3,3> TargetCalculator::shape( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& W )
00150 {
00151   MsqVector<3> a1    = W.column(0);
00152   MsqVector<3> a2    = W.column(1);
00153   MsqVector<3> a3    = W.column(2);
00154   MsqVector<3> a1xa2 = a1 * a2;
00155   
00156   double len1  = length(a1);
00157   double lenx  = length(a1xa2);
00158   double alpha = fabs(a1xa2 % a3);
00159   double coeff = Mesquite::cbrt(1/alpha);
00160   double inv1  = 1.0/len1;
00161   double invx  = 1.0/lenx;
00162   
00163   MsqMatrix<3,3> q;
00164   q(0,0) = coeff*len1; q(0,1) = coeff*inv1*(a1 % a2); q(0,2) = coeff*inv1*(a1 % a3);
00165   q(1,0) = 0.0;        q(1,1) = coeff*inv1*lenx;      q(1,2) = coeff*invx*inv1*(a1xa2 % (a1 * a3));
00166   q(2,0) = 0.0;        q(2,1) = 0.0;                  q(2,2) = coeff * alpha * invx;
00167   return q;
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00171 MsqMatrix<2,2> TargetCalculator::shape( const MsqMatrix<3,2>& W )
00172 {
00173   double len1 = length(W.column(0));
00174   double inv1 = 1.0/len1;
00175   double root_alpha = sqrt(length(W.column(0) * W.column(1)));
00176   double coeff   = 1.0/root_alpha;
00177 
00178   MsqMatrix<2,2> result;
00179   result(0,0) = coeff*len1; result(0,1) = coeff*inv1*(W.column(0) % W.column(1));
00180   result(1,0) = 0.0  ;      result(1,1) = root_alpha * inv1;
00181   return result;
00182 }
00183 
00184 
00185 MsqMatrix<2,2> TargetCalculator::shape( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& W )
00186 {
00187   double len1 = length(W.column(0));
00188   double inv1 = 1.0/len1;
00189   double root_alpha = sqrt(fabs(det(W)));
00190   double coeff   = 1.0/root_alpha;
00191 
00192   MsqMatrix<2,2> result;
00193   result(0,0) = coeff*len1; result(0,1) = coeff*inv1*(W.column(0) % W.column(1));
00194   result(1,0) = 0.0       ; result(1,1) = root_alpha * inv1;
00195   return result;
00196 }
00197 
00198 bool TargetCalculator::factor_3D( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& A,
00199                                   double& Lambda,
00200                                   MsqMatrix<3,3>& V,
00201                                   MsqMatrix<3,3>& Q,
00202                                   MsqMatrix<3,3>& Delta,
00203                                   MsqError& err )
00204 {
00205   MsqVector<3> a1xa2 = A.column(0) * A.column(1);
00206   double alpha = a1xa2 % A.column(2);
00207   Lambda = Mesquite::cbrt( fabs(alpha) );
00208   if (Lambda < DBL_EPSILON)
00209     return false;
00210   
00211   double la1_sqr = A.column(0) % A.column(0);
00212   double la1 = sqrt(la1_sqr);
00213   double la2 = length(A.column(1));
00214   double la3 = length(A.column(2));
00215   double lx = length(a1xa2);
00216   double a1dota2 = A.column(0) % A.column(1);
00217   
00218   double inv_la1 = 1.0/la1;
00219   double inv_lx  = 1.0/lx;
00220   V.set_column( 0, A.column(0) * inv_la1 );
00221   V.set_column( 1, (la1_sqr * A.column(1) - a1dota2 * A.column(0)) * inv_la1 * inv_lx );
00222   V.set_column( 2, (alpha / (fabs(alpha) * lx)) * a1xa2 );
00223   
00224   double inv_la2 = 1.0/la2;
00225   double inv_la3 = 1.0/la3;
00226   double len_prod_rt3 = Mesquite::cbrt( la1 * la2 * la3 );
00227   Q(0,0) = 1.0;
00228   Q(1,0) = Q(2,0) = 0.0;
00229   Q(0,1) = a1dota2 * inv_la1 * inv_la2;
00230   Q(1,1) = lx * inv_la1 * inv_la2;
00231   Q(2,1) = 0.0;
00232   Q(0,2) = (A.column(0) % A.column(2)) * inv_la1 * inv_la3;
00233   Q(1,2) = (a1xa2 % (A.column(0) * A.column(2))) * inv_lx * inv_la1 * inv_la3;
00234   Q(2,2) = fabs(alpha) * inv_lx * inv_la3;
00235   Q *= len_prod_rt3 / Lambda;
00236   
00237   double inv_prod_rt3 = 1.0/len_prod_rt3;;
00238   Delta(0,0) = la1*inv_prod_rt3;
00239   Delta(0,1) = 0.0;
00240   Delta(0,2) = 0.0;
00241   Delta(1,0) = 0.0;
00242   Delta(1,1) = la2*inv_prod_rt3;
00243   Delta(1,2) = 0.0;
00244   Delta(2,0) = 0.0;
00245   Delta(2,1) = 0.0;
00246   Delta(2,2) = la3*inv_prod_rt3;
00247   
00248   return true;
00249 }
00250 
00251 bool TargetCalculator::factor_surface( const MsqMatrix<3,2>& A,
00252                                   double& Lambda,
00253                                   MsqMatrix<3,2>& V,
00254                                   MsqMatrix<2,2>& Q,
00255                                   MsqMatrix<2,2>& Delta,
00256                                   MsqError& err )
00257 {
00258   MsqVector<3> cross = A.column(0) * A.column(1);
00259   double alpha = length(cross);
00260   Lambda = sqrt(alpha);
00261   if (Lambda < DBL_EPSILON)
00262     return false;
00263   
00264   double la1_sqr = A.column(0) % A.column(0);
00265   double la1 = sqrt(la1_sqr);
00266   double la2 = length(A.column(1));
00267   double inv_la1 = 1.0/la1;
00268   double dot = A.column(0) % A.column(1);
00269   
00270   V.set_column( 0, A.column(0) * inv_la1 );
00271   V.set_column( 1, (la1_sqr * A.column(1) - dot * A.column(0)) / (la1*alpha) );
00272   
00273   double prod_rt2 = sqrt( la1 * la2 );
00274   Q(0,0) = prod_rt2 / Lambda; Q(0,1) = dot / (prod_rt2 * Lambda);
00275   Q(1,0) = 0.0; Q(1,1) = 1.0/Q(0,0);
00276   
00277   double inv_prod_rt2 = 1.0/prod_rt2;
00278   Delta(0,0) = la1*inv_prod_rt2; Delta(0,1) = 0.0;
00279   Delta(1,0) = 0.0;              Delta(1,1) = la2*inv_prod_rt2;
00280   
00281   return true;
00282 }
00283 
00284 bool TargetCalculator::factor_2D( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A,
00285                                   double& Lambda,
00286                                   MsqMatrix<2,2>& V,
00287                                   MsqMatrix<2,2>& Q,
00288                                   MsqMatrix<2,2>& Delta,
00289                                   MsqError& err )
00290 {
00291   double alpha = det(A);
00292   Lambda = sqrt(fabs(alpha));
00293   if (Lambda < DBL_EPSILON)
00294     return false;
00295   
00296   double la1_sqr = A.column(0) % A.column(0);
00297   double la1 = sqrt(la1_sqr);
00298   double la2 = length(A.column(1));
00299   double inv_la1 = 1.0/la1;
00300   double dot = A.column(0) % A.column(1);
00301   
00302   V.set_column( 0, A.column(0) * inv_la1 );
00303   V.set_column( 1, (la1_sqr * A.column(1) - dot * A.column(0)) / (la1*alpha) );
00304   
00305   double prod_rt2 = sqrt( la1 * la2 );
00306   Q(0,0) = prod_rt2 / Lambda; Q(0,1) = dot / (prod_rt2 * Lambda);
00307   Q(1,0) = 0.0; Q(1,1) = 1.0/Q(0,0);
00308   
00309   double inv_prod_rt2 = 1.0/prod_rt2;
00310   Delta(0,0) = la1*inv_prod_rt2; Delta(0,1) = 0.0;
00311   Delta(1,0) = 0.0;              Delta(1,1) = la2*inv_prod_rt2;
00312   
00313   return true;
00314 }
00315 
00316 MsqMatrix<3,3> TargetCalculator::new_orientation_3D( const MsqVector<3>& b1,
00317                                                      const MsqVector<3>& b2 )
00318 {
00319   double lb1_sqr = b1 % b1;
00320   MsqVector<3> cross = b1 * b2;
00321   double lb1 = sqrt(lb1_sqr);
00322   double inv_lb1 = 1.0/lb1;
00323   double inv_lx = 1.0/length(cross);
00324   MsqMatrix<3,3> V;
00325   V.set_column( 0, inv_lb1 * b1 );
00326   V.set_column( 1, (lb1_sqr * b2 - (b1 % b2) * lb1) * inv_lb1 * inv_lx );
00327   V.set_column( 2, cross * inv_lx );
00328   return V;
00329 }
00330                                                      
00331 MsqMatrix<3,2> TargetCalculator::new_orientation_2D( const MsqVector<3>& b1,
00332                                                      const MsqVector<3>& b2 )
00333 {
00334   double lb1_sqr = b1 % b1;
00335   double inv_lb1 = 1.0/sqrt(lb1_sqr);
00336   MsqMatrix<3,2> V;
00337   V.set_column(0, b1 * inv_lb1);
00338   V.set_column(1, (lb1_sqr * b2 - (b1 % b2) * b1) * (inv_lb1 / length(b1 * b2)));
00339   return V;
00340 }
00341 
00347 static inline bool ideal_constant_skew_I_3D( EntityTopology element_type,
00348                                       MsqMatrix<3,3>& q )
00349 {
00350   switch (element_type) {
00351     case HEXAHEDRON:
00352       q = MsqMatrix<3,3>(1.0); // Identity
00353       return false;
00354     case TETRAHEDRON:
00355       // [ x,   x/2, x/2 ] x^6 = 2
00356       // [ 0,   y,   y/3 ] y^2 = 3/4 x^2
00357       // [ 0,   0,   z   ] z^2 = 2/3 x^2
00358       q(0,0) = 1.122462048309373; 
00359       q(0,1) = q(0,2) = 0.56123102415468651;
00360       q(1,0) = q(2,0) = q(2,1) = 0.0;
00361       q(1,1) = 0.97208064861983279;
00362       q(1,2) = 0.32402688287327758;
00363       q(2,2) = 0.91648642466573493;
00364       return true;
00365     case PRISM:
00366       //            [ 1   0   0 ]
00367       //  a^(-1/3)  [ 0   1  1/2]
00368       //            [ 0   0   a ]
00369       //
00370       // a = sqrt(3)/2
00371       //
00372       q(0,0) = q(1,1) = 1.0491150634216482;
00373       q(0,1) = q(0,2) = q(1,0) = 0.0;
00374       q(1,2) = 0.52455753171082409;
00375       q(2,0) = q(2,1) = 0.0;
00376       q(2,2) = 0.90856029641606972;
00377       return true;
00378     default:
00379       return false;
00380   }
00381 }
00382 
00388 static inline bool ideal_constant_skew_I_2D( EntityTopology element_type,
00389                                       MsqMatrix<2,2>& q )
00390 {
00391   switch (element_type) {
00392     case QUADRILATERAL:
00393       q = MsqMatrix<2,2>(1.0); // Identity
00394       return true;
00395     case TRIANGLE:
00396       // [ x, x/2 ]  x = pow(4/3, 0.25)
00397       // [ 0, y   ]  y = 1/x
00398       q(0,0) = 1.074569931823542; q(0,1) = 0.537284965911771;
00399       q(1,0) = 0.0;               q(1,1) = 0.93060485910209956;
00400       return true;
00401     default:
00402       return false;
00403   }
00404 }
00405 
00406 void TargetCalculator::ideal_skew_3D( EntityTopology element_type,
00407                                       Sample s,
00408                                       const PatchData& pd,
00409                                       MsqMatrix<3,3>& q,
00410                                       MsqError& err ) 
00411 {
00412   if (!ideal_constant_skew_I_3D(element_type,q)) {
00413     const MappingFunction3D* map = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( element_type );
00414     if (!map) {
00415       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00416       return;
00417     }
00418     map->ideal( s, q, err );
00419     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00420     q = TargetCalculator::skew(q);
00421   }
00422 }
00423 
00424 void TargetCalculator::ideal_skew_2D( EntityTopology element_type,
00425                                       Sample s,
00426                                       const PatchData& pd,
00427                                       MsqMatrix<2,2>& q,
00428                                       MsqError& err ) 
00429 {
00430    if (!ideal_constant_skew_I_2D(element_type,q)) {
00431     const MappingFunction2D* map = pd.get_mapping_function_2D( element_type );
00432     if (!map) {
00433       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00434       return;
00435     }
00436     MsqMatrix<3,2> J;
00437     map->ideal( s, J, err );
00438     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00439     q = TargetCalculator::skew(J);
00440   }
00441 }

00443 void TargetCalculator::ideal_shape_3D( EntityTopology element_type,
00444                                       Sample s,
00445                                       const PatchData& pd,
00446                                       MsqMatrix<3,3>& q,
00447                                       MsqError& err ) 
00448 {
00449   if (!ideal_constant_skew_I_3D(element_type,q)) {
00450     const MappingFunction3D* map = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( element_type );
00451     if (!map) {
00452       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00453       return;
00454     }
00455     map->ideal( s, q, err );
00456     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);

00461 void TargetCalculator::ideal_shape_2D( EntityTopology element_type,
00462                                       Sample s,
00463                                       const PatchData& pd,
00464                                       MsqMatrix<2,2>& q,
00465                                       MsqError& err ) 
00466 {
00467    if (!ideal_constant_skew_I_2D(element_type,q)) {
00468     const MappingFunction2D* map = pd.get_mapping_function_2D( element_type );
00469     if (!map) {
00470       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00471       return;
00472     }
00473     MsqMatrix<3,2> J;
00474     map->ideal( s, J, err );
00475     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00476     q = TargetCalculator::shape(J);
00477   }

00479 
00480 MsqMatrix<3,3> TargetCalculator::new_aspect_3D( const MsqVector<3>& r )
00481 {
00482   MsqMatrix<3,3> W(0.0);
00483   W(0,0) = Mesquite::cbrt( r[0]*r[0]/(r[1]*r[2]) );
00484   W(1,1) = Mesquite::cbrt( r[1]*r[1]/(r[0]*r[2]) );
00485   W(2,2) = Mesquite::cbrt( r[2]*r[2]/(r[1]*r[0]) );
00486   return W;
00487 }
00488 
00489 MsqMatrix<2,2> TargetCalculator::new_aspect_2D( const MsqVector<2>& r )
00490 {
00491   return new_aspect_2D( r[0] / r[1] );
00492 }
00493 
00494 MsqMatrix<2,2> TargetCalculator::new_aspect_2D( double rho )
00495 {
00496   MsqMatrix<2,2> W( sqrt(rho) );
00497   W(1,1) = 1.0/W(0,0);
00498   return W;
00499 }
00500 
00501 static NodeSet get_nodeset( EntityTopology type, int num_nodes, MsqError& err )
00502 {
00503   bool midedge, midface, midvol;
00504   TopologyInfo::higher_order( type, num_nodes, midedge, midface, midvol, err );
00505   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err)) return NodeSet();
00506   
00507   NodeSet bits;
00508   bits.set_all_corner_nodes(type);
00509   if (midedge) 
00510     bits.set_all_mid_edge_nodes(type);
00511   if (midface)
00512     bits.set_all_mid_face_nodes(type);
00513   if (TopologyInfo::dimension(type) == 3 && midvol)
00514     bits.set_mid_region_node();
00515  
00516   return bits;
00517 }
00518 
00519 void TargetCalculator::jacobian_3D( PatchData& pd, 
00520                                     EntityTopology type,
00521                                     int num_nodes,
00522                                     Sample location,
00523                                     const Vector3D* coords,
00524                                     MsqMatrix<3,3>& J,
00525                                     MsqError& err )
00526 {
00527     // Get element properties
00528   NodeSet bits = get_nodeset( type, num_nodes, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00529   const MappingFunction3D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_3D( type );
00530   if (!mf) {
00531     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00532     return;
00533   }
00534 
00535     // Get mapping function derivatives
00536   const int MAX_NODES = 27;
00537   assert(num_nodes <= MAX_NODES);
00538   size_t indices[MAX_NODES], n;
00539   MsqVector<3> derivs[MAX_NODES];
00540   mf->derivatives( location, bits, indices, derivs, n, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00541   
00542     // calculate Jacobian
00543   assert(sizeof(Vector3D) == sizeof(MsqVector<3>));
00544   const MsqVector<3>* verts = reinterpret_cast<const MsqVector<3>*>(coords);
00545   assert(n > 0);
00546   J = outer( verts[indices[0]], derivs[0]  );
00547   for (size_t i = 1; i < n; ++i) 
00548     J += outer( verts[indices[i]], derivs[i] );
00549 }
00550 
00551 void TargetCalculator::jacobian_2D( PatchData& pd,
00552                                     EntityTopology type,
00553                                     int num_nodes,
00554                                     Sample location,
00555                                     const Vector3D* coords,
00556                                     MsqMatrix<3,2>& J,
00557                                     MsqError& err )
00558 {
00559     // Get element properties
00560   NodeSet bits = get_nodeset( type, num_nodes, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00561   const MappingFunction2D* mf = pd.get_mapping_function_2D( type );
00562   if (!mf) {
00563     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00564     return;
00565   }
00566 
00567     // Get mapping function derivatives
00568   const int MAX_NODES = 9;
00569   assert(num_nodes <= MAX_NODES);
00570   size_t indices[MAX_NODES], n;
00571   MsqVector<2> derivs[MAX_NODES];
00572   mf->derivatives( location, bits, indices, derivs, n, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00573   
00574     // calculate Jacobian
00575   assert(sizeof(Vector3D) == sizeof(MsqVector<3>));
00576   const MsqVector<3>* verts = reinterpret_cast<const MsqVector<3>*>(coords);
00577   assert(n > 0);
00578   J = outer( verts[indices[0]], derivs[0] );
00579   for (size_t i = 1; i < n; ++i) 
00580     J += outer( verts[indices[i]], derivs[i] );
00581 }
00582 
00583 
00584 void TargetCalculator::get_refmesh_Jacobian_3D( 
00585                               ReferenceMeshInterface* ref_mesh,
00586                               PatchData& pd,
00587                               size_t element,
00588                               Sample sample,
00589                               MsqMatrix<3,3>& W_out,
00590                               MsqError& err )
00591 {
00592     // get element
00593   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index( element );
00594   const EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00595   const unsigned n = elem.node_count();
00596 
00597   const unsigned MAX_NODES = 27;
00598   assert(n <= MAX_NODES);
00599   
00600     // get vertices
00601   Mesh::VertexHandle elem_verts[MAX_NODES];
00602   const std::size_t* vtx_idx = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00603   const Mesh::VertexHandle* vtx_hdl = pd.get_vertex_handles_array();
00604   for (unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00605     elem_verts[i] = vtx_hdl[vtx_idx[i]];
00606   
00607     // get vertex coordinates
00608   Vector3D vert_coords[MAX_NODES];
00609   ref_mesh->get_reference_vertex_coordinates( elem_verts, n, vert_coords, err );
00610   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00611   
00612     // calculate Jacobian
00613   jacobian_3D( pd, type, n, sample, vert_coords, W_out, err );
00614   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00615 }
00616 
00617 void TargetCalculator::get_refmesh_Jacobian_2D( 
00618                               ReferenceMeshInterface* ref_mesh,
00619                               PatchData& pd,
00620                               size_t element,
00621                               Sample sample,
00622                               MsqMatrix<3,2>& W_out,
00623                               MsqError& err )
00624 {
00625     // get element
00626   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index( element );
00627   const EntityTopology type = elem.get_element_type();
00628   const unsigned n = elem.node_count();
00629 
00630   const unsigned MAX_NODES = 9;
00631   assert(n <= MAX_NODES);
00632   
00633     // get vertices
00634   Mesh::VertexHandle elem_verts[MAX_NODES];
00635   const std::size_t* vtx_idx = elem.get_vertex_index_array();
00636   const Mesh::VertexHandle* vtx_hdl = pd.get_vertex_handles_array();
00637   for (unsigned i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00638     elem_verts[i] = vtx_hdl[vtx_idx[i]];
00639   
00640     // get vertex coordinates
00641   Vector3D vert_coords[MAX_NODES];
00642   ref_mesh->get_reference_vertex_coordinates( elem_verts, n, vert_coords, err );
00643   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00644   
00645     // calculate Jacobian
00646   jacobian_2D( pd, type, n, sample, vert_coords, W_out, err );
00647   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00648 }
